All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Iterable<org.apache.pivot.wtk.Component>, org.apache.pivot.beans.Bindable, org.apache.pivot.collections.Sequence<org.apache.pivot.wtk.Component>, org.apache.pivot.wtk.ConstrainedVisual, org.apache.pivot.wtk.Visual
public class EasyDietMainWindow
extends org.apache.pivot.wtk.Window
implements org.apache.pivot.beans.Bindable

This is the background class for the startup window. It defines how the Application looks like and how the parts are arranged (navigation, toolbar, content)
